stats.lessons module¶

stats.lessons.sample_wiener_process(x0, sigma, dt, N, ntrial=1)[source]¶
stats.lessons.sample_ou_process(x0, sigma, tau, dt, N, ntrial=1)[source]¶

Sample from OU

Parameters:
  • x0 – initial conditions
  • sigma – standard deviation of driving Wiener process
  • tau – exponential damping time constant
  • dt – time step
  • N – number of samples to draw

stats.lessons.showim(x, **vargs)[source]¶
stats.lessons.infer_states_Gaussian_ADF(Y, variance, true_states=None, do_plot=True)[source]¶
class stats.lessons.PGOM(a=1, b=0)[source]¶

Approximate Gaussian distribution to use in abstracted forward- backward. Used to condition Gaussian states on Poisson observations. An additional option to combine another Gaussian factor into the conditioning has been added.

class Approximate(y, g, a=1, b=0)[source]¶
